title: EastEnders spoilers: Martin takes revenge on Ben
text:
Martin Fowler’s (James Bye) alliance with Ben Mitchell (Max Bowden) in EastEnders has been anything but smooth, and Martin seemingly has enough of his new partner in crime as, during the coming episodes, he takes revenge on the Mitchell lad for all that he’s put him through. The question is: will his plan succeed?

Upon learning of daughter Bex’s (Jasmine Armfield) suicide attempt, Martin wasted little time in returning home to the Square. In an attempt to ensure Stacey (Lacey Turner) could also come home, he appealed to Ben’s better nature. However — never one to miss an opportunity — Ben has used the leverage he has on Stace to convince Martin to help him out with his dodgy dealings.

The two have been in cahoots — against Martin’s will, of course — ever since and, in the coming episodes, the fruit-and-veg stall owner begins to feel the pressure, as he must keep his work with Ben a secret — a tall task given that this is Walford we’re talking about.

Unable to keep it a secret any longer, Martin confides in Kush about everything — and Kush demands that they confront Ben together.

However, upon doing so, Ben makes it clear that he’s not backing down — and Martin comes up with a plan as a result.

Martin goes to Jack (Scott Maslen) and speaks to him about a ‘friend’ who’s in trouble but he’s ultimately left annoyed at Jack’s response. However, Jacks’ suspicions are piqued — and he quizzes Sonia (Natalie Cassidy) about what her ex-hubby is up to. In spite of her own concerns, Sonia covers for Martin again.

Martin makes a promise to Bex that he’ll spend time with her, but his plans are scuppered once Ben demands he take part in another job.

Later, Tubbs finds himself arrested — and Jack watches on. Meanwhile — with Tubbs in custody — Martin manages to persuade Ben to do the job with him.

It’s clear that Martin has a motive — but the question is, what is it that he’s up to?

One to watch: Thursday 24th October at 7:30pm on BBC One.
